amendment.description: Amendment provides that section 1234, Involuntary Cases, shall apply with respect to cases commenced before, on, and after the date of enactment of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Gutierrez.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Gutierrez amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
